title: wow just had a game where i was vs someone who was actually hacking.
body:
tell me exactly. with math included. how an orianna ONLY 280 ap. can kill a victor in .86 seconds with 1 combo from full hp. 

the answer? you CANT. i had 280 ap as well and was doing no damage at all to anybody. and she is able to kill me in less then 1 sec from full hp?? blatent obvious hacking. there is no other explaination. 

oh and the retard voli on teh enemy team was saying some bullshit about damage being increased based on level difference. load of hogwash and cannot exsist in a game where comebacks are supposed to be possible.
